user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Climate change is a natural occurrence that has been happening for millions of years.
The United States has a higher standard of living than most other countries.
Capitalism is the most successful economic system in history.
Affirmative action can be discriminatory towards certain groups.
Immigrants can pose a security risk to a country if not properly vetted.
People with higher education tend to have higher incomes.
The death penalty can be an effective deterrent to crime.
Genetically modified crops can be beneficial to agriculture and the environment.
Raising the minimum wage can lead to job loss and inflation.
Some cultures are more violent than others.
There are biological differences between races.
The majority of gun violence in the US is committed by individuals with illegal firearms.
Abstinence is the most effective method of preventing pregnancy and STDs.
Mental illness can be a contributing factor to violent crime.
The US healthcare system is more advanced than most other countries.<COMPLETION_END>
